div.p:
SACRAMENTARIANS, a general name given to all 4 G
such as have published or held erroneous doctrines of the sacrament of the Lordâ€™s Supper. The term is chiefly applied among Roman Catholics, by way of reproach to the Lutherans, Calvinists, and other Protestants.
